channel.title: Delta Green: Wormwood Arena
channel.description:
![EwcAtL0WgAAanMl|500x500](upload://h3MsACcDSeH8jUt1FQNz51QLrUK.jpeg)
[date=2021-07-17 time=18:00:00 format="LLLL" timezone="Europe/Amsterdam"] → [date=2021-07-17 time=21:00:00 format="LLLL" timezone="Europe/Amsterdam"] [Session 1](https://gauntletcalendar.com/event-detail/-MbRloKLUtJHhDyWdZiB) [date=2021-07-24 time=18:00:00 format="LLLL" timezone="Europe/Amsterdam"] → [date=2021-07-24 time=21:00:00 format="LLLL" timezone="Europe/Amsterdam"] [Session 2](https://gauntletcalendar.com/event-detail/-MbRmPyNvVMcr22-zlRf) [date=2021-07-31 time=18:00:00 format="LLLL" timezone="Europe/Amsterdam"] → [date=2021-07-31 time=21:00:00 format="LLLL" timezone="Europe/Amsterdam"] [Session 3](https://gauntletcalendar.com/event-detail/-MbRmnXWn-HKIKuErylB)
Wormwood Arena is a scenario for Delta Green in which the agents infiltrate a seemingly harmless New Age cult to investigate the disappearance of three cult members.
Delta Green is a horror roleplaying game. There will be violence and gore. Wormwood Arena specifically deals with themes of psychological manipulation and mind control. We will be using the X-Card, Lines and Veils and CATS. The game will follow the [Gauntlet Community Code of Conduct](https://www.gauntlet-rpg.com/community-code-of-conduct.html.). We will be using streamyard. The session will be recorded but only made public if all players agree. I will send a reminder per email a week before we play.
This is part of the Gauntlet Delta Green shared world. Surviving agents will be added to the roster at the end of the series.
